Posts.Content: Hi Lauren29, I have just completed chemo and radiation about 5 months ago and am feeling sick in the stomach, fatigue,dizziness and losing weight.I work full time and its demanding,I can't go sometimes because I feel so tired and unwell,I am anaemic and just don't have much of an appetite. any ideas or others out there in the same position too? oh and chemo fog is starting to effect me.I have been getting side effects of dehydration and it was scary, so I have to remember drink water. thanks Sharin.
Posts.Title: SICKNESS / NAUSEA 5 MONTHS AFTER CHEMO & RADIOTHERAPY
